text_content:
description: Collection of Revenue Grid video guides
{{ company_name }} Video Guides
 
 
 
In order to facilitate product users' learning curve and increase their awareness of all {{ company_name }} features and functions we are publishing video guides on the official {{ company_name }} Vimeo Channel, you can view it by opening the below link:
https://vimeo.com/user69313488/collections
The Vimeo Collection includes the following {{ company_name }} instructional videos:
Basic use
{{ company_name }} Introduction (Overview): https://vimeo.com/309122184 
{{ company_name }} Product Walkthrough: https://vimeo.com/281311729 
Product setup
{{ company_name }} Full Installation (MS Exchange, Outlook for Windows): https://vimeo.com/382606890 
{{ company_name }} Full Installation (MS Exchange, Outlook for Mac): https://vimeo.com/384031982 
{{ company_name }} Full Installation (Office 365, Outlook on the Web): https://vimeo.com/386536131 
How to set up {{ short_company_name }} Chrome Extension for Gmail: https://vimeo.com/447805212 
{{ company_name }} Full Installation (MS Outlook Desktop, custom Enterprise configurations only!): https://vimeo.com/385513763 
Working with Emails
How to Save an Email: https://vimeo.com/392038812 
Items Quick Saving: https://vimeo.com/392994760 
How to Use Salesforce Templates: https://vimeo.com/390718973 
How to Track Email Opens (Engagement panel): https://vimeo.com/391779888 
Working with Calendar items
How to Save a Calendar Item: https://vimeo.com/392930131 
Meeting Scheduler: How to Share Your Calendar Availability ("Book Me"): https://vimeo.com/392661575 
Meeting Scheduler: How to Suggest Meeting Time Slots ("Time Slots"): https://vimeo.com/392007175 
Working with Salesforce records
How to Create a Follow Up: https://vimeo.com/391285520 
How to Create a Task: https://vimeo.com/390931760 
How to Create a Contact or a Lead: https://vimeo.com/390742636 
How to Create an Opportunity: https://vimeo.com/390495050
How to Search for a Salesforce Record: https://vimeo.com/390933011 
Advanced use
{{ company_name }} Customization settings: https://vimeo.com/438630578
{{ company_name }} Sync settings (pt.1): https://vimeo.com/394970343
{{ company_name }} Sync settings (pt.2): https://vimeo.com/395190894
{{ company_name }} Sync settings (pt.3): https://vimeo.com/395227604
Admin level use
How to Create an Exchange Impersonation Account to Authorize the End Users in {{ short_company_name }} Sync Engine: https://vimeo.com/447501654
Install {{ company_name }} managed package in Salesforce: https://vimeo.com/423167799
Set Up {{ company_name }} Visualforce App in Salesforce: https://vimeo.com/418445116
Add {{ company_name }} Component Tabs to Salesforce UI: https://vimeo.com/418953523
Add {{ company_name }} Custom Reports to Salesforce UI: https://vimeo.com/439263390
